name: Hampton Inn & Suites Denver Tech Center

reviews.text: Very nice hotel located in the Denver Tech Center. Lots of nice restaurants near by. Has a lobby computer w/ high speed internet access. Free breakfast w/ eggs, cereal, ham, donuts, muffins, etc. Very clean hotel. Still has the new hotel smell. Would definitely stay again. Rooms are a little small, but clean.
reviews.title: Brand new hotel.

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Denver Tech Hotel
